sys_properties.description:
Enable URL attachments: Instead of uploading a file directly, the user can instead provide a download link that will be shown as a regular attachment. If the users clicks the attachment link, he will be redirected to the URL that was provided when creating the attachment.
This property will modify the attachment links on the forms as well as the attachment popup, depending on the mode configured in property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.mode.
Note: This property is the dead man's switch: If set to false, all virtual attachment related script are deactivated instantly.
sys_properties.name: x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.enabled

sys_update_version.name: sys_properties_80e6f1f1973091102f77b4b3f153af18
